name: Retro Girl {handmade} Bandana Bibs
description:
Retro Girl Collection

Functional by protecting clothing from dribbles and spills yet fashionable at the same time! Mix and Match different prints and colours with your baby’s outfit. 100% All Cotton front, backed with a super soft high quality white micro fleece. The neckline is slightly curved to ensure a comfortable better fit, snug under baby's chin. Top-stitched for durability, complete with Velcro closure for safety and {My Chickadee} brand label. Bib is sized to fit babies from 3 to 12 months ~ approximately 36cm x 19cm

(The circumference of the neck is approximately 12 inches or 30 cm when adjusted to the largest size.)

{ALL BIBS}

FREE STANDARD POSTAGE AUSTRALIA WIDE

name: Personalised {handmade} Cushion Covers
description:
Personalised {handmade} Cushion Covers

Pillow Front detailed with appliqué ‘Name or Word’ of your choice. The back comprises of fabric with a similar or same matching fabric appliqué as the front. Cover can be made with Denim Fronts and Cotton appliqué / backing or Cotton fronts with Denim / Cotton appliqué / backing. If your looking for easy to maintain cushions - These easy to use envelope covers means no more broken zips or buttons that rip when trying to remove the cover for washing. {My Chickadee} brand label on back. Standard Cover Size ~ 36 cm x 36 cm (will fit 14" size pillow insert) *Contact us first to discuss colour choices before purchasing* FREE STANDARD POSTAGE AUSTRALIA WIDE

name: Baby / Toddler {handmade} Denim Snuggle Blankets
description:
{Handmade} Baby / Toddler Denim Snuggle Blanket

100% Soft Denim front backed with a super soft high quality Minky fabric print. Blanket comes with co-ordinating loop ribbon, activity clip, is top-stitched for long durability and {My Chickadee} brand label. Blanket measures a generous size of approx. 42cm x 52 cm This beautiful blanket will grow with the child. It can be attached easily to a baby carrier, stroller or car seat to cover wrapped baby without falling onto the ground. It can even double as a portable changing mat and you can also attach a binky or toy with a toy ring when out and about! As baby grows, the loop ribbon allows toddlers to easily carry the blanket around with them or snuggle with while travelling.

FREE STANDARD POSTAGE AUSTRALIA WIDE
